types.html:
y avoir de l'eau dans le gaz

  1. (informal) for there to be trouble brewing, for there to be trouble in paradise, for there to be tension in the air
    il y a de l'eau dans le gaz ― there's trouble brewing, there's tension in the air

Usage notes

[edit]
  • Often said in the context of a couple about to be arguing.

See also

[edit]
  • battre de l'aile
trans: for there to be trouble brewing, for there to be trouble in paradise, for there to be tension in the air

title: y avoir de l'eau dans le gaz
ipas: /i a.vwaʁ də l‿o dɑ̃ l(ə) ɡaz/
